Newbie Guide:

Thanks!

Goblin Raiders, Goblin Thieves, Kaboo Orcs and Kaboo Orc Soldiers are roaming near the village. You need to kill 20 of these scoundrels.

If you decide to go, I'll show you the way. It's close, just around the entrance to the village.

I can teleport you there, if you don't want to waste time. Pretty cool, huh?
